name: Coloured (Binary Zone PD)
overview: The object of this game is to match three colours in a row. To do this you must press space to prevent the colours from changing. If the colours match 3 in a row then you get 100 points. However, if you do not match three colors in a row the game is over and it is someone else's turn. This is one of the first non-SEUCK games created by Richard Bayliss, music is also by Richard Bayliss.
